events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request to return a product and receive money back has been identified as a refund case.
The case has been assigned to support agent Lisa to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Yes, the order number is 45789X and the jacket is completely unused and still in the original packaging sealed.
Great! You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label we will email you today.
Thank you for the quick confirmation and helpful instructions. I appreciate your support!
I have arranged to send the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed immediately.
Just following up to confirm that your return was received and your refund was successfully processed. Let us know if you need anything else.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed and there are no outstanding issues. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. We would love your feedback on how we handled your refund.
